publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-473 Gil Paterson: Fire Service Open Days—That the Parliament congratulates the Fire Service and its entire staff for the continuing initiative in opening up fire stations to the general public; encourages community groups and members of the public to take the opportunity to visit their local fire service when it holds its open days where they can appreciate the varied and wide expertise that the fire service has; further supports the continuing sophisticated training required to enable the fire service to utilise the vast array of modern technology in its use, and particularly acknowledges the professional manner and courtesy shown by Fire Service personnel in its open day initiative.

S3M-473 Gil Paterson: Fire Service Open Days—That the Parliament congratulates the Fire Service and its entire staff for the continuing initiative in opening up fire stations to the general public; encourages community groups and members of the public to take the opportunity to visit their local fire service when it holds its open days where they can appreciate the varied and wide expertise that the fire service has; further supports the continuing sophisticated training required to enable the fire service to utilise the vast array of modern technology in its use, and particularly acknowledges the professional manner and courtesy shown by Fire Service personnel in its open day initiative. Supported by: Keith Brown*
S3M-473 Fire Service Open Days (lodged on 13 September 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-473 Fire Service Open Days (lodged on 13 September 2007) Rhoda Grant*

S3M-473 Fire Service Open Days (lodged on 13 September 2007) Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Mary Scanlon*, Angela Constance*, Alex Neil*, Alasdair Allan*, Rob Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jackie Baillie*, Christina McKelvie*, Tavish Scott*, John Lamont*, Ken Macintosh*
S3M-473 Fire Service Open Days (lodged on 13 September 2007) Brian Adam*, Bill Kidd*
